title: @Malicious Metal, I challenge you to a Pokemon battle!
body:
[](https://encrypted-tbn1.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRMEUEpgtV_62oQyG4rTI1MDD8hrF8BX1DeBCArXc9NgZomiMyE)

Go, Magikarp!

http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/cytus/images/6/61/Magikarp%21.gif/revision/latest?cb=20150402030816

Your move, Metal Man.

replies.body:
Go Aggron!
Show 'em why metal trumps all!

https://49.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_ma3olvKeWX1qd87hlo1_500.gif

Magikarp, use surf!
http://31.media.tumblr.com/a959a90a147a55ffb81ad59aa26781ae/tumblr_myu3c7wtHp1t6mtrzo1_500.gif

#IT'S SUPER EFFECTIVE!
As a Pokemon nerd im calling CHEATING, MAGIKARP CANT LEARN SURF! This calls for disqualification!
If Kaiba can summon 3 Blue-Eyes White dragons in one turn then I can do this.
Applying YuGiOh logic to pokemon? THIS IS BLASPHEMY. DARE I SAY HERESY.
Screw the rules, I have money!

Too bad all that money cant buy you skill (at battling)

: ^)

./s
*Furiously stocks up on Full Restores and Max Revives*
**YOU ARE NOT IN THE ELITE 4**

I am worse than the Elite Four.

I am using Whitney's Miltank technique.
Pls, get a fighting type. shes a cakewalk. i had more trouble with Bugsy and that scyther, that stuff had ridiculous stats for that point in the game.

The Miltank was much less difficult in SoulSilver.

Back in old Silver, that thing was a fucking team-wiper. Yoir fighting types would have trouble enduring its Body Slam.
tbh silver/gold was so long ago i hardly remember.

Dang, this isn't looking good. Come back, Gyarados!

All right, all right. Never mind. You can just... lie down there... with that bling...

Gyrados?

Malicious Metal
http://blog.memes.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/ouch-town.png

Magikarp can only know hydro pump, bounce, celebrate, flail, happy hour, splash, and tackle tho. However technically max spA Magickarp checks no spDef investment Aggron 

Here is the calc: 252+ SpA Choice Specs Magikarp Hydro Pump vs. 0 HP / 0 SpD Aggron: 320-378 (113.8 - 134.5%) -- guaranteed OHKO

Edit: as a life orb Magikarp you do literally just enough damage to kill Aggron
252+ SpA Life Orb Magikarp Hydro Pump vs. 0 HP / 0 SpD Aggron: 281-330 (100 - 117.4%) -- guaranteed OHKO

Note: This does not account for the 20% miss chance on Magikarp, the only reasonable move Aggron would have that would not OHKO Magikarp is heavy slam when no boosting item is used

252+ Atk Aggron Heavy Slam (120 BP) vs. 0 HP / 0 Def Magikarp: 154-182 (85 - 100.5%) -- 6.3% chance to OHKO

*Talks into radio*
He knows too much. Keep an eye on him.
